name: RONDERO
description:
'' My Head hurts a lot!... what a strange dream!... Wait, this is not a dream. Where is Maria ? ''

Inmerse yourself in this fascinanting 3D adventure and help Rondero find his wife and save his town from the clutches of evil.

Rondero is an action - horror - first person shooter with lot of action and AWESOME 3D GRAPHICS!

could you find all the weapons in this demo level ? TRY IT!

Controls:

Move [W,A,S,D]
Look [Mouse]
Fire [Left Mouse]
Use [E]

Crounch [Shift]

Weapon Change [Mouse Wheel]
Weapon Slots [Number Keys]

RELOAD MAGAZINE GAME JAM #1 - MAY 2022
